message.content:
cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is the most likely category as the paper deals with the stabilization of a discrete-time linear system. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is also likely as the paper discusses the mutual information between the system state and the observation. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) are less likely but still possible categories as the paper uses a proof technique that recursively bounds the conditional density of the system state. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the least likely category as there is no mention of neural networks or evolutionary algorithms in the abstract.
